properties.entry: SELECT USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , BIRTH_DATE , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , GRADE , ENROLL_DATE , USER_NO , OVERDUE FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?

INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , BIRTH_DATE , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , GRADE , ENROLL_DATE , USER_NO , OVERDUE ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , SYSDATE , SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL , DEFAULT )
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_NAME = ? , PHONE = ? , EMAIL = ? , ADDRESS = ? , BIRTH_DATE = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , BIRTH_DATE , PHONE , EMAIL , ADDRESS , ENROLL_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_PWD = ? WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE NOT USER_ID = 'admin'

SELECT RNUM, USER_ID, USER_NAME, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, OVERDUE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, USER_NO, OVERDUE, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE NOT USER_ID = 'admin' ) A) WHERE (RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?)

SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, OVERDUE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, USER_NO, OVERDUE, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE NOT USER_ID = 'admin' ORDER BY OVERDUE DESC ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, OVERDUE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, USER_NO, OVERDUE, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE NOT USER_ID = 'admin' ORDER BY OVERDUE ASC ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, OVERDUE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, USER_NO, OVERDUE, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE NOT USER_ID = 'admin' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, OVERDUE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, USER_NO, OVERDUE, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE NOT USER_ID = 'admin' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE ASC ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, OVERDUE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, USER_NO, OVERDUE, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE NOT USER_ID = 'admin' ORDER BY GRADE DESC ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, OVERDUE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, GRADE, ENROLL_DATE, USER_NO, OVERDUE, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE NOT USER_ID = 'admin' ORDER BY GRADE ASC ) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET GRADE = ? WHERE USER_ID = ?
